docs.text: Project Cleaner Features ¶ Long-Path Deletion Support Single .gitignore file-based folder cleaning Doxygen output cleaning based on Doxygen Configuration Logging and Monitoring Operation with GUI Drag-and-drop folder and file additions
docs.title: Features

docs.text: Long-Path Deletion Support Single .gitignore file-based folder cleaning Doxygen output cleaning based on Doxygen Configuration Logging and Monitoring Operation with GUI Drag-and-drop folder and file additions
docs.title: Project Cleaner Features

docs.text: Project Cleaner ¶ .gitignore based folder cleaner ¶ Usage ¶ If you have a .gitignore file, drag-drop it to textbox near select .gitignore and set your gitignore file. If you do not have a .gitignore file, please use open gitignore builder and download content as file .gitignore. Drag-drop your folders that contains projects Click Run Cleaner If you have Doxygen generated outputs to clean. A Doxygen configuration reader tries to find out the output folder and delete it. You can stop with the stop cleaner button. Development ¶ Visual Studio 2022 for Project Development ¶ Install Visual Studio 2022 Visual Studio 2022 Community Edition – Son Ücretsiz Sürümü İndir Wix Toolkit for Setup Generation ¶ Step-1 Enable .Net 3.5.1 Components Open Turn Windows Features On of Off Menu Check .Net Framework 3.5 Complete Setup Step-2 Download and Install Wix Toolkit and Visual Studio 2022 Extension Downloads Step-3 After installation, if you have a reference problem, you need to configure DLLs from the path such as "WixUIExtension.dll." C:\Program Files (x86)\WiX Toolset v3.11\bin References ¶ Git Auto Increment Tool GitHub - jeromerg/NGitVersion: Automatic versioning of C# and C++ DLLs (CLI and Native) based on Git Repository information Advanced Wix Setup Real-World Example: WiX/MSI Application Installer • Helge Klein Wix Editor https://wixedit.github.io/ Wix Standalone Setup Toolkit for Github Actions GitHub - fbarresi/wix: wix standalone - checkout this repo to build wix project inside github action
docs.title: Usage

docs.text: If you have a .gitignore file, drag-drop it to textbox near select .gitignore and set your gitignore file. If you do not have a .gitignore file, please use open gitignore builder and download content as file .gitignore. Drag-drop your folders that contains projects Click Run Cleaner If you have Doxygen generated outputs to clean. A Doxygen configuration reader tries to find out the output folder and delete it. You can stop with the stop cleaner button.
